mapper.insert: insert into `accountflow` (accountType, amount, note, usableAmount, freezedAmount, tradeTime,account_id) values (#{accountType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usableAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{freezedAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tradeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
